name: BirdFont
description: BirdFont is a free font editor. It can create vector graphics and TTF, EOT and SVG fonts, even exclusive personal fonts.

en_US.description: BirdFont is a free font editor. It can create vector graphics and TTF, EOT and SVG fonts, even exclusive personal fonts.
en_US.name: BirdFont

zh_CN.description: BirdFont是一个免费的字体编辑器，它可以创建矢量图形以及TTF、EOT 和 SVG字体，同时还可以创建专属个性字体。
zh_CN.name: BirdFont
